title: 09/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Aaron Rodgers is asking for too much when he wants to be included in roster decisions in Green Bay when compared to other top players in the NFL. He tries to define what makes Tom Brady so great after the 7-time Super Bowl champion was named the greatest football player ever. He also gives his final set of predictions for all 32 teams in the NFL before the regular season begins. Plus, Fox Sports College Football Analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to tell Colin what his biggest takeaway was from the opening weekend of games.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
